snippet: Lawyers for Craig Heimburger said they would ask a federal appeals court to review a judge’s decision last month to approve a $1 billion settlement of concussion lawsuits.
abstract: Former NFL player Craig Heimburger will reportedly appeal concussion settlement; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Craig Heimburger said they would ask a federal appeals court to review a judge’s decision last month to approve a $1 billion settlement of concussion lawsuits.

headline.main: Former Player Will Appeal N.F.L. Settlement
